name: SciFi Sound Cube Pro
description:
Sci-Fi Sound Cube Pro. No Ads

For all the science fiction fans out there we bring you our awesome 3D Sci-Fi sound cube.

It floats in space like the famous Borg cube, but this one is loaded with sci-fi sounds, robots, lasers, aliens, monsters, space ships, explosions etc.

Simply touch the pictures on the cube to play the futuristic sounds, drag or flick the cube to watch it spin in space.

Remember in space nobody can hear you scream! Er but amazingly you can hear our Sci-Fi sound cube so download it now while the Earth is still in range.
